languages.text: {n}Изгой облизывает губы, и вы видите усеянный мелкими, недоразвитыми зубами язык. Это уже не болезнь, а явная мутация.{/n}
{n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Изгой облизывает губы, и вы видите усеянный мелкими, недоразвитыми зубами язык. Это уже не болезнь, а явная мутация.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El paria se relame y ves que su larga lengua está repleta de dientes vestigiales. No es una enfermedad lo que le aflige, sino un evidente caso de mutación.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El paria se relame y ves que su larga lengua está repleta de dientes vestigiales. No es una enfermedad lo que le aflige, sino un evidente caso de mutación.{/n}

languages.text: {n}追放者が唇を舐めると、小さく未発達な歯がちりばめられた舌が見える。これは病気ではなく、明らかな突然変異である。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}追放者が唇を舐めると、小さく未発達な歯がちりばめられた舌が見える。これは病気ではなく、明らかな突然変異である。{/n}

languages.text: {n}眼前的弃民舔了舔嘴唇，你看到他的舌头上布满了尚未完全发育的细小牙齿。这并不是疾病，而是明显的变异。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}眼前的弃民舔了舔嘴唇，你看到他的舌头上布满了尚未完全发育的细小牙齿。这并不是疾病，而是明显的变异。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als sich der Aussätzige die Lippen leckt, siehst du seine mit winzigen Zähnen übersäte Zunge. Er ist nicht krank, sondern offenkundig mutiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als sich der Aussätzige die Lippen leckt, siehst du seine mit winzigen Zähnen übersäte Zunge. Er ist nicht krank, sondern offenkundig mutiert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le paria se lèche les lèvres, dévoilant au passage une langue criblée de petits chicots atrophiés. De toute évidence, il ne s'agit pas d'une maladie, mais d'une mutation quelconque.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le paria se lèche les lèvres, dévoilant au passage une langue criblée de petits chicots atrophiés. De toute évidence, il ne s'agit pas d'une maladie, mais d'une mutation quelconque.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yurtsuz, dudaklarını yalıyor. Ufak, henüz gelişmemiş dişlerle kaplı bir dil görüyorsun. Bu bir hastalık değil. Mutasyon olduğu aşikâr.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The outcast licks his lips and you see a tongue studded with small, underdeveloped teeth. This is no disease, but an obvious mutation.{/n}
